name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt2, robbingdog, VictoriaW)

name: zem
text: Most of the strips I think are underrated I scroll down and see you posting the same thing. We should probably exchange phone numbers/addresses/underwear

name: deimosrising
text: yeah you have pretty good taste in awesome. send me a message on AIM sometime or something my name is the same here and there

name: zem
text: I have never seen you online

name: deimosrising
text: Haha yeah I am currently staying at a friend's apartment so it is not convenient for me to use the computer for long stretches of time.

name: m-e-charm
text: I find this little scene of future friends on the internet extremely heart warming.

name: snowman
text: I got really uncomfortable and embarrassed when i was reading this, I don't know why.

name: tekende
text: Hahaha! This made me laugh a lot.

name: invidious
text: You don't like it when they talk about gettin' their bone on, do you?

name: ravindra108
text: Would extremely heart warming constitute heart burn? Because that's kind of what I'm feeling about it.

name: tekende
text:
so how is it going guys

are you best e-friends

talking on aim every night till 2am

posting myspace comments

sending custom season-related e-cards

name: zem
text: i'm going to propose in a week (don't tell deimosrising)

name: heccibiggs
text: This is genuinely great.

name: zapatos
text: I wonder if he said yes

name: tekende
text: that is some sweet beans zem

name: mercuri0us
text: And our sins.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Lyle has ideas, but Jesus has super powers.

name: shmuckeles
text: i ruined my keyboard with tears when i read the alt text for this one

name: shmuckeles
text: laughter tears, by the way. definitely one of the best early strips, if not THE best

name: fielding
text: It is good that you clarified, else we might have thought you were shedding tears for anyone who would do anything mean to Jesus.

name: peterjoel
text: Jesus can look after himself. You know... apart from that one time... but I heard that Mel Gibson paid a bunch of people to do that, and most of us don't have those kind of resources.

name: landowmpg
text: I find it hard to concentrate on reading your posts as I'm always just waiting for that eye to blink at me.

name: kickstart
text: Onstad just sounds so pleased to say it. Chipper, even.

name: zzzleepy
text: top ten, maybe top five.  its weird that i would never say "lyle is my favorite achewood character" to someone, but the funny in some of my favorite strips come from his ornery attitude.

name: magb
text: Lyle just wants to be heard.

name: rapid_roy
text: He puts up a mean front, but he just wants some love.

name: incendiary
text: His face is that of a desperate, lonely man.

name: ssddr
text: Lyle's logic is airtight as always

name: lizjones
text: Lyle holds that eyebrow arch for a damn long time.

name: deancain29
text: Lyle is a darkhorse.

name: geysershitdick
text: I remember when I found out you shouldn't kick a basketball.

name: tekende
text: I remember when I kicked a basketball once. It hurt really, really bad.

name: mr_lostman28
text:
I remember when I hit a basketball that my friend had bowled to me with a baseball bat.
similar results

name: origotoshi
text: Did it turn into a discussion on how you could crack Jesus with a baseball bat?

name: trevor
text: I want to hear more of Lyle's ideas if that is ok

name: epicurus
text: This is a lot like many of my conversations (with me as Lyle) except I would never kick a basketball; that is terrible.

name: darkwaffle
text: Lyle is golden.

name: twentyfivepast
text: ALT TEXT: You could run up and kick him in the shins.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "You could run up and kick him in the shins."

name: wargasmic
text: Lyle has a lot of ideas about how to best assault Jesus.

name: philosophe
text: I love how in the last panel Lyle's all concerned that no one will get to hear his 'ideas'.

name: coco
text: You get the idea that Lyle knows exactly what kind of smack down he'd bring on Jesus, and he's upset that no one will ever know his genius . . .

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Come back! I was going to make espresso!

name: monsterboy
text: Pretend to be a leper then tug his beard hold on to it and give him loads of little tappy-kicks in the shin!

name: fox
text: I think I've had too many conversations where I end up saying "this is rediculous" and walk away.

name: cthulhu235
text: I want to hear his ideas. Where is that story arc?

name: molesticide
text:
it is the responsibility of the readers (since we have a voice) to speculate on lyle's ideas:

-wedgies
-noogies (careful of thorns in your knuckles)
-swim underneath him as he walks, wearing a false shark fin on your back
-sell him to the romans
-joke shocker
-throw a fake rubber cockroach at him
-electrocute his dick.

anybody else?

name: paperboy_2000
text: Bite all the heads off of his Easter Peeps

name: bjorntd
text: Oh man. This makes you the worst sort of person.

name: orvel
text: The saddest thing.

name: phthoggos
text:
Lyle leans way back in panel 3
so great is the force of his blasphemous certainty

name: retinarow
text: You can't kick Jesus! That'd make him [b]cross[b/]!

name: kensai
text: Just a few days before, Teodor had a full head of hair...

name: fosters
text:
Everybody has a favorite strip. This one is mine.

Lyle has given this some serious thought.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: Lyle ain't afraid of no fuckin' Jesus.

name: endoftheworld
text: The worst part is Jesus would totally let you kick him, looking all sad and dissapointed in you. Next thing you know you'd end up on an Albrecht Durer wood carving with the caption "Our Lord and the Spiteful Drunkard"

name: sharpdresseddan
text: i like how Lyle is pointing with the bottle in panel 5

name: red-barchetta
text: He's not just pointing the bottle.... he's waggling it! Serious business!

name: comrade_tom
text: Turn the other shin.

name: sweet_clyde
text: Let he who is without shin cast the first stone.

name: jhunter
text:
he shakes his bottle in panel five
it is a defiant shake, the shake of a man contemplating the harm he could theoretically visit upon the son of god.

name: 7th_shot
text: When I gave this strip my vote, it went from 4.4 to 4.5. I feel like I've done some good here.

name: mikeronomicon
text: I really want to hear Lyle's idea. I bet it involves whiskey and groinal destruction.

name: wallabeechamp
text: Could you kick Bhudda or Muhammed? Are these the topics Lyle thinks about?

name: scorpio_nadir
text: No! Lyle is First Christian Degenerate! He don't roll with HEATHENS!

name: genequagmire
text: Epic.

name: carlyle
text: Lyle has many ideas.
